traits.name: Blessing of Orcus
traits.desc: Black orcs have advantage on saving throws against the spells and effects of undead creatures.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.
